LanguageData.CanningFactory.label: canning table
LanguageData.CanningFactory.description: The canning table needs to be loaded with steel. Then you make canned meat, vegetables, and meals.

LanguageData.VG_CanningFactory.label: Canning Factory
LanguageData.VG_CanningFactory.description: Canning Factory can be set to make meals or to can diffenert types of food to preserve them.
